Programming for Information Professionals Instructors

Elliott Hauser

Elliott Hauser is a PhD Student in information science at UNC Chapel Hill. He's hacking education as one of the cofounders of Coursefork.org. Find Elliott Hauser on Twitter, Github, and on the web.

Programming for Information Professionals Participants

You should see your name in the list below. If you don't, email me or open an Issue on Github.

I want to know more about you! Later in class we'll enter in all of your information like mine is. For now, please fill out this Questionaire.
